csc171.project03.model

Class GameKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc171.project03.model.GameKeeper

  • public abstract class GameKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds current state data and has methods that return data based on the current game state. The Controller delegates decisions to the GameKeeper so that it stays focused on controlling.
